Articles.Content:
No matter what I do, I even installed (after experiencing the problem for long) the Rejector mod, but I can't get any more 'Test part' contracts.Have I done something wrong, bug, or contracts' system is fubar?

Moreover, what's wrong with the XP, it's very scarce in 'normal difficulty' compared to 0.9ish versions.

I've tried to solve it as some1 is Steam's forums has suggested, by lowering the reputation, but it's been unsuccesful.

- **KSP version** : 1.0.4., Windows 64b. Steam.

- A **.craft file or save files:** [http://www.filedropper.com/contractbug](http://www.filedropper.com/contractbug)
- The **ouput\_log.txt or player.log** : [http://www.filedropper.com/outputlog_2](http://www.filedropper.com/outputlog_2)
- I'm unsure if it's a clean installation. Guess I installed it for last time when it was 1.0.3

Thank you

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-01T15:56:44Z" title="07/01/2015 03:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 1, 2015</time> by Mastadans**
